== Bio ==
Antti is working as a project director in research infrastructures at
CSC, and appointed by NeIC as project leader for Nordic Tryggve project.
As a collaboration of NeIC and ELIXIR nodes, Tryggve is developing
platform for sensitive biomedical data to facilitate sharing, combining
and processing of sensitive data in secure and legally compliant setting.
